pages.title: Grain
pages.text: TFC has 6 grains, $(item)Wheat, Barley, Rye, Rice, Oat, and Maize (corn)$(). To start processing them, craft them with a knife.
Then, grind them in a $(thing)quern$() to make $(item)flour$().
Craft the flour with a water bucket to make dough.
pages.title: Dough

pages.text: Cook it in a forge or firepit to make $(item)bread$().
